turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a a a few pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! i can help. what can i get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like three pizzas. All medium. And I I think I want to go ahead and and just get pepperonis and fresh garlic on all three of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 medium pizzas, pepperoni and fresh garlic. okay, did you want to maybe make it 2 large pizzas instead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks, but I would like a thick crust on the pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright! let me get you the total for those.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total will be $42.44, is that okay?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! give me one moment while I send your order to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order is in the works and should be ready for pickup in 40 min.
